description: Manages configuration on Apache CloudStack based clouds.

domain.description: Domain the account is related to. Only considered if C(account) is used.

api_key.description: API key of the CloudStack API.

api_url.description: URL of the CloudStack API e.g. https://cloud.example.com/client/api.

api_secret.description: Secret key of the CloudStack API.

storage.description: Ensure the value for corresponding storage pool.

api_region.description: Name of the ini section in the C(cloustack.ini) file.

cluster.description: Ensure the value for corresponding cluster.

account.description: Ensure the value for corresponding account.

zone.description: Ensure the value for corresponding zone.
